title: Luc(as) de groot
content:
hi,   
I'm a typography student at Bezalel academy of art and design. I'm despretly   
looking for any info/hints about a dutch tyopeface designer namedLucas De   
Groot. especialy any printed works by him (books/magazines whatever...).   
so if anybody can help me... ![:-)](http://web.archive.org/web/20140805003802im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/clipart/happy.gif)   
Roy
author: anonymous
